name: Kevin Malone
quotes: I just want to lie on the beach and eat hot dogs. That's all I've ever wanted.
It's just nice to win one.
I have very little patience for stupidity.
If anyone gives you 10,000 to 1 odds on anything, you take that bet.
Me think, why waste time say lot word, when few word do trick?
I got six numbers. One more, and it would have been a complete phone number.
